casebody.data:
B&B HARDWARE, INC., petitioner,
v.
HARGIS INDUSTRIES, INC., dba Sealtite Building Fasteners, dba East Texas Fasteners, et al. No. 13-352. Supreme Court of the United States July 1, 2014.

Case below, 716 F.3d 1020 .

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Eighth Circuit granted.
